actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families

official_title: To amend the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act to provide for the explusion from school and termination of educational services with respect to a child with a disability who carries a weapon to school or to a school function.

summary.text: Amends the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act to require school personnel, under specified provisions of such Act, to order the expulsion from school and the termination of educational services for any child with a disability who carries a weapon to school or to a school function.

titles.title: To amend the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act to provide for the explusion from school and termination of educational services with respect to a child with a disability who carries a weapon to school or to a school function.
